abstract.original_text: publicly funded repositories, such as the WHO COVID database with rights for unrestricted research re-use and analyses in any form or by any means with acknowledgement of the original source. These permissions are granted for free by Elsevier for as long as the COVID-19 resource centre remains active. ✜ EBM grade III Data based on non-randomised clinical trials, multiple case series, other experimental studies, and dramatic results from uncontrolled studies; ✜ EBM grade IV Expert opinion, case reports, studies in other species, pathophysiological justification. If no grade is specified, the EBM level is grade IV. Further reading Roudebush P, Allen TA, Dodd CE, Novotny BJ. Application of evidence-based medicine to veterinary clinical nutrition. J Am Vet Med Assoc 2004; 224: 1765-71. E B M r a n k i n g u s e d i n t h i s a r t i c l e R E V I E W / ABCD guidelines on feline infectious peritonitis Available online at www.sciencedirect.com
